game.name: Sorry! I surrounded beauty!
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You embody Chen Mo, embark on a romantic journey through a first-person perspective. Throughout your interactions with different girls, you must navigate divergent choices, confront critical challenges, and gradually unravel the hidden truths woven into the story’s core.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You embody Chen Mo, embark on a romantic journey through a first-person perspective. Throughout your interactions with different girls, you must navigate divergent choices, confront critical challenges, and gradually unravel the hidden truths woven into the story’s core.

reviewHighlights.text: 第一次玩真的很难， 有些地方总感觉在拖时间， 我怎么能每次都选中如何伤所有女孩的心了， 我太好了吧 这猪脚一定是个渣中的渣王
